title: Roxio Creator NXT 7 Pro - Complete CD/DVD Burning and Creativity Suite for PC [PC Download][Old Version]
description: Roxio Creator NXT Pro 7 is a full suite of 20+ applications. Work with burning tools, editing tools and capture or convert files. Manage your photos, videos, audio, and data. Record your screen, capture video, and create productions with brand-new effects. This suite includes PaintShop Pro for photo editing and graphic design and Photo Mirage to create photo animations. It also includes Roxio Burn with encryption for burning, copying, and encrypting files to disc or USB. Creator NXT Pro 7 is the power solution for your digital media needs.
